title: Didn't receive a capsule for leveling up
body: I had just turned level 50 today and didn't receive a capsule for leveling up.  I checked the match where I leveled up and I didn't even get XP for it.  Bug?

replies.body: Let me know if you still haven't seen that capsule pop up!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2JuTpckJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-16T04:32:14.920+0000)
>
> Let me know if you still haven't seen that capsule pop up!

I just got level 37 and received no reward can tlyou look into this for me?
Do me a favor and check for that capsule now fam!

yeah i just got level 46 and didnt get one either
